DOC.brief_summary: To compare pharmacokinetics ( PK ) AVP-786 ( deuterated [ d6 ] dextromethorphan hydrobromide [ d6-DM ] /quinidine sulfate [ Q ] ) AVP-923 ( dextromethorphan hydrobromide [ DM ] /Q ) steady state .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Study Comparing AVP-786 With AVP-923
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult male females 18 60 year age BMI 18 32 kg/m2 History presence significant disease History substance abuse and/or alcohol abuse past 2 year Use tobaccocontaining nicotinecontaining product within 6 month Use prescription overthecounter medication within 14 day
